document.full_text: a panel advising the u.n. secretary-general on accountability for the bloody end of sri lanka's war overstepped its mandate by producing a investigative report concluding there are "credible allegations" of war crimes, sri lanka said on thursday.
document.title: u.n. war crimes panel overstepped its mandate: sri lanka
lines_and_colors: a panel advising the u.n. secretary-general on accountability for the bloody end of sri lanka's war overstepped its mandate by producing a investigative report concluding there are "credible allegations" of war crimes, sri lanka said on thursday.
